roleset.name: not make up ones mind

example.name: pseudo-transitive
example.text: Mr. Bush's problem isn't so much that he seems to be agonizing over the issue as it is that [he]-3 seems [*-3]to vacillate on it.

roleset.note: VACILLATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'vacillate' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry modes_of_being_with_motion-47.3, but this sense of vacillate is for movement only, doesn't fit the .01 sense. (from vacillate.01-v predicate notes)
